member.name: T:ScintillaNET_FindReplaceDialog.CharacterRange
member.summary: Specifies a range of characters. If the cpMin and cpMax members are equal, the range is empty. The range includes everything if cpMin is 0 and cpMax is –1.

member.name: F:ScintillaNET_FindReplaceDialog.CharacterRange.cpMin
member.summary: Character position index immediately preceding the first character in the range.

member.name: F:ScintillaNET_FindReplaceDialog.CharacterRange.cpMax
member.summary: Character position immediately following the last character in the range.

member.name: M:ScintillaNET_FindReplaceDialog.CharacterRange.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies a range of characters. If the cpMin and cpMax members are equal, the range is empty. The range includes everything if cpMin is 0 and cpMax is –1.

member.summary: Find must match the whole word
